name: quiz-builder-monorepo
description: Quiz builder application monorepo containing frontend and backend services. Created with Next.js and Node.js. Created by Roman Sukhanov.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:init: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.init-project: npm run install:all && npm run env:setup && npm run db:init
